channel.title: Simple Server Question
channel.description: Hi, I have a linux server set up here running ubuntu server editioin, it does NOT have a gui. Can I still run the moparscape server, I can't run it right now because it asks for a gui. Any thoughts?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2007, 05:32:33 PM[/size][hr]Any help at all? Please
